name: Sundance Resort

reviews.title: A great retreat, small, beautiful
reviews.text: Okay, give the kids a break. Many of the employees at Sundance are nice Mormon kids from Provo and just serving coffee, for them, is living on the edge.

description: Sundance is a four season luxury mountain resort with activities ranging from alpine skiing and snowshoeing in the winter to horseback riding, fly fishing and hiking in the summer. Sundance offers a variety of art classes and spa treatments year round.
